Function reference

version 0.0.0.9200

Crime

Access Crime data

Extract crime areas within a polygon

  • ukp_crime_poly

Unlist and clean crime data

  • ukp_crime_unlist

Find street level crime within a specified distance or area

  • ukp_crime

Neighbourhood

Access Neighbourhood data

Find the assoiate neighbourhood code with a long/lat string

  • ukp_neighbourhood_location

Return the list of neighbourhoods for a force.

  • ukp_neighbourhood

Utilities

Utility functions

ukpolice API call

  • ukp_api

Find the date of the latest update from the UK Police databse

  • ukp_last_update
